version_description:
:: 全新樂器 ::

新增 4 款全新（免費）樂器：
— 明亮合成器、白閃合成器、芝加哥貝斯、咣當貝斯

還為現有樂器包新增部分新樂器！
— 古典樂：黃銅刺、克林巴琴、音樂盒、唱詩班
— 爵士樂：靜音小號、倍低音提琴、舊式鋼琴、羅德斯鍵盤
— 搖滾樂：現代貝斯、吉他合成器、勾弦合成器、金屬包

此外，我們重新製作了部分樂器
— 搖滾樂：所有 6 種電吉他
— 出神樂：方波、鋸齒波、和聲、驅動音效


:: 重要備註 ::

這將是適配 32 位元設備的最後一版主要更新。下一主要更新版本 Medly 4.0 將不再支持：iPhone 4、iPhone 5、iPhone 5C、iPad Mini 1、iPad 2、iPad 3 和 iPad 4。

32 位元設備已無法滿足用於音訊處理的計算需求。隨著我們不斷添加新功能，如音訊自動化、彎音和視訊匯出，我們發現這些設備無法支援它們。

Medly 4.0 是我們邁出的一大步，雖然我們非常希望舊設備也能使用，但這不可能做到。

有疑問？請向我們發送電郵：hi@medlylabs.com
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

Support for iOS 11
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
支持 iPhone X
Bug Fixes

MEDLY 4 IS HERE!

Medly 4 is our biggest update to date, and there's something here for everyone!


NEW: AUDIO INSTRUMENT
– Add audio clips into your song using the Audio Instrument.
– Record audio clips to add to your song.
– Or drag & drop audio loops & samples from our new Library.
– The Audio Instrument is available for free as part of the Starter Collection.


NEW: LIBRARY
– Use the Library to browse audio samples or note loops
– Drag & drop samples & loops onto the Board
– Over 100 audio samples and fully editable note loops are included for free as part of the Starter Collection.


NEW: MASTER COLLECTION
– A new collection filled with 30 new instruments and over 600 samples & loops for the Library
– Over 450 fully editable note loops
– Over 150 professionally recorded vocals and audio samples


NOTABLE ADDITIONS:
– Crisper sounds from integrating Roli's audio technology and changing internal mastering settings
– Add up to 24 tracks
– Switch between the Major, Minor and our Simple scale
– Create triplet notes
– Give your song "pump" using our new Ducker
– View automation on the Board, switch effects using the Mixer
– New per-track echo delay rate
– New per-track reverb, pan, and ducker effects
– Continuous Notes is now a per-track setting (off by default)
– Solo the current track when editing
– Select all notes (touch and hold anywhere with 2 fingers)
– New interactive timeline when editing
– Track colors are now based on instrument type


NOTABLE CHANGES:
– Removed the Apple Watch app
– Removed undo & redo capabilities. We're working on a replacement
– Removed the Swedish localization
– Medly 4.0 has dropped support for 32-bit devices


NOTE: This version of Medly will delete old Sound Packs which must be redownloaded again (at no charge)

Medly 4 is our biggest update to date, and there's something here for everyone!

Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

- If you solo a track when editing a Section, it'll no longer be soloed when you exit
- Medly will now remember the scroll position of Sections
- Bug Fixes

- Fixed issues with playback
- Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

:: Audio Import ::

- You can now import your audio files into Medly!
- Browse files and select the ones to import
- Drag & Drop one or more files from other apps (available on iPads running iOS 11)
- Or quickly reuse a recently imported audio file
- View, play, and trim your clips before importing
- Support for a wide variety of formats
- Available for purchase as part of the Master Collection


:: Other Improvements ::

- Audio clips in Medly take up less processing power

Bug Fixes

- Fixed issue where Audio Export wouldn't behave correctly on certain devices
- Fixed issue where notes were sometimes not played after an extended period of use
- Fixed issue where automation graph on the Board didn’t update correctly
- Fixed issue where tapping on the edit view timeline to play will play the bar incorrectly
- Note labels now display correct sharps or flats for minor keys

Some big and exciting changes!

A new Track Panel
- Updated styling to match iOS 11’s design, with large, bold titles
- Easier and clearer navigation between Packs, Instruments, Library and Options

Support for Wide Color
- We've updated our colors to take advantage of wide color P3 displays
- Now shows more vibrant and exciting colors on Apple's latest devices
- Devices that support wide color include: iPhone 7, 7+, 8, 8+, X and iPad Pro


- Other improvements
- Bug Fixes

iPad Pro Support

Medly 5 is here!

Arcade Pack:
- 24 instruments inspired by retro and modern games
- Over 200 loops and samples
- Free iMessage stickers based on Arcade instruments
- Get Arcade as part of the new Medly Member Subscription

Christmas Pack:
- 10 instrument and over 100 loops to get you into the Holiday spirit
- Get the Christmas Pack as part of the new Medly Member Subscription

Medly Member:
- Become a Member and get access to all of Medly's instruments, loops and features
- New packs released every month
- Try out Medly Memeber with a 2 week free trial
- Previously purchased packs will still be accessible (regardless if you're a Medly Member)

A New Way To Open Songs:
- Individual instruments and samples will be downloaded on demand
- Open and edit songs that use unpurchased instruments and samples
- Unpurchased instruments and samples are locked until they're changed to ones that are owned

Other Improvements:
- New Template Picker, with all of Medly's sample songs in one simple browsable place
- New Medly exclusive album artwork
- A new Handbook, providing more tips and guides than ever; find it in the Settings menu

Medly 5 is here!

Arcade Pack:
- 24 instruments inspired by retro and modern games
- Over 200 loops and samples
- Free iMessage stickers based on Arcade instruments
- Get Arcade as part of the new Medly Member Subscription

Christmas Pack:
- 10 instrument and over 100 loops to get you into the Holiday spirit
- Get the Christmas Pack as part of the new Medly Member Subscription

Medly Member:
- Become a Member and get access to all of Medly's instruments, loops and features
- New packs released every month
- Try out Medly Memeber with a 2 week free trial
- Previously purchased packs will still be accessible (regardless if you're a Medly Member)

A New Way To Open Songs:
- Individual instruments and samples will be downloaded on demand
- Open and edit songs that use unpurchased instruments and samples
- Unpurchased instruments and samples are locked until they're changed to ones that are owned

New Mastering Engine:
- New mastering and mix engine designed to produce higher quality and fuller sounds
- It starts with rebalancing the volume of all instruments, and adding an unique EQ to each one
- With most bass type instruments receiving an underlying sub
- Finally we spread the sounds across the entire audio spectrum, based on the type of instrument used
- The result: fuller, richer sound
- This change will cause your existing songs to sound different, but you can easily fix this by adjusting the volume of each track up or down, until you achieve the desired sound

Other Improvements:
- New Template Picker, with all of Medly's sample songs in one simple browsable place
- New Medly exclusive album artwork
- A new Handbook, providing more tips and guides than ever; find it in the Settings menu

- Featuring professionally recorded vocals
- Get Dancehall, exclusive to Medly Member

We're bringing something special to Medly!

Undo & Redo:
- You can now undo most changes in a song
- Tap with 2 fingers to show the Undo & Redo buttons

But... we didn't stop there!

Introducing History:
- A visual list of all your changes
- Scroll through your changes to quickly undo and redo them

Undo & Redo and History are available for free to all users!

iOS 13 Support

IMPORTANT MESSAGE: Please upgrade to iOS 13.1

We've been made aware of a bug in iOS 13.0 affecting the file system. This system bug in iOS 13.0 could cause you to lose your songs. In this Medly update, we've taken measures to prevent further song loss and will attempt to recover your songs if you have upgraded to iOS 13.1 or later.


Other Improvements:
- Sharper rendering of audio waveforms on the Board
- iOS 13 bug fixes


Pop Pack:
- You'll find September's pack to be a popular one
- Includes 12 instruments and 64 new loops and samples
- Featuring professionally recorded vocals
- Exclusive to Medly Member

IMPORTANT MESSAGE: Please upgrade to iOS 13.1

We've been made aware of a bug in iOS 13.0 affecting the file system. This system bug in iOS 13.0 could cause you to lose your songs. In this Medly update, we've taken measures to prevent further song loss and will attempt to recover your songs if you have upgraded to iOS 13.1 or later.


Other Improvements:
- Sharper rendering of audio waveforms on the Board
- iOS 13 bug fixes

Member Authentication:
- We have a new authentication system for Member
- To re-authenticate, open Medly while connected to the internet and Medly will automatically move to the new system
- After re-authentication, you can continue to use Member online or offline as before
- Note: You will need to upgrade to Medly 5.5 or later before by December 12, 2019 to continue to use Medly Member


Design Changes:
- You can now open the Medly Store while subscribed, and switch your subscription between monthly and yearly payments
- We've updated some designs throughout Medly and added some helpful messages

Bug Fixes:
- Stretching a short note that's placed on first column is now possible
- Fixed intermittent issue with copy and pasting notes in a drum track

Festival Pack:
- Celebrate the New Year with Festival, a pack filled with variety of EDM music and sounds!
- Includes 12 instruments and 100 new loops and samples
- Featuring professionally recorded vocals
- Exclusive to Medly Member

New Pack: Carnaval
- Celebrate Brazilian Carnaval with February's new pack!
- Carnaval includes 12 instruments, 34 loops & samples, and 3 songs
- Exclusive to Medly Member

Update Notes:
- iOS 13 App Store has made it harder to find the changes we've made
- So we built "Update Notes", a place where you can see all changes we've made to Medly
- Update Notes will present all major and minor updates in an easily digestible format
- You can view Update Notes by going into Settings on the Album's screen
- iOS 13 Exclusive

Dark Mode:
- We're one step closer to adding dark mode to Medly
- We've updated some user interface elements with a dark theme
- iOS 13 Exclusive

Cellular Downloads:
- Sounds can now be automatically downloaded while on a cellular connection
- When opening a song that requires downloading sounds, you will be asked to proceed
- You can also choose between always, ask and never downloading on cellular using the song Settings page

Other Improvements:
- Swipe right on undo/redo panel to dismiss it
- Handbook will now remember the last page you were on
- Start Pack instrument fixes
- Changed how instrument and loop data is stored and loaded
- An updated Album Editor

This version no longer supports iOS 11

New Pack: Carnaval
- Celebrate Brazilian Carnaval with February's new pack!
- Carnaval includes 12 instruments, 34 loops & samples, and 3 songs
- Exclusive to Medly Member

Update Notes:
- iOS 13 App Store has made it harder to find the changes we've made
- So we built "Update Notes", a place where you can see all changes we've made to Medly
- Update Notes will present all major and minor updates in an easily digestible format
- You can view Update Notes by going into Settings on the Album's screen
- iOS 13 Exclusive

New Pack: Sakura
- Cherry blossoms are dropping in Japan, and we’re dropping our latest pack: Sakura!
- Sakura includes 12 instruments, 48 loops & samples, and 3 songs
- Exclusive to Medly Member

Audio Import bug fixes

Please note: due to COVID-19, May's pack will be delayed to June. But don't worry, we still have a small update for May!

Pointer and Keyboard
- We just made it a lot easier to use Medly on iPad.
- We added pointer support throughout Medly, along with keyboard shortcuts.
- To discover what keyboard shortcuts you can use, hold the command key to see the list.

New Sounds
- Due to current circumstances, we're unable to release a full pack for the month of May. However, we still wanted to provide some new sounds!
- New to the Sakura Pack: "Dera" and "Ronin" instruments.
- We also added a new song, Higashiyama, and 10 new loops and samples for you to use.
- Member Exclusive

Other Improvements
- "Library" has been renamed to "Loops", along with a new icon.
- An updated design for "Reorder Albums" and Song's "Move to Album" pages.

New Pack: Dream Hop
- Chill to some relaxing beats and a smooth sax, with June’s release
- Dream Hop includes 9 instruments, 58 loops & samples, and 2 songs
- Featuring professionally recorded saxophone audio samples
- Exclusive to Medly Member

Please note: due to COVID-19, July’s pack will be delayed to August. We hope to return to our regular monthly releases after August.

New Pack: Reggaeton
- Vibe to the music of our first Spanish vocalist with this summer’s pack!
- Reggaeton includes 12 instruments, 54 loops & samples, and 3 songs
- Featuring professionally recorded vocals from our first non-English singer
- Exclusive to Medly Member

Improvements:
- You can now restart Medly’s tutorial from within the Album screen Settings
- Open Settings by tapping the gear in the top right when viewing your Albums

New Pack: Joyride
- Let loose and go on a joyride with this month’s pack!
- Joyride includes 8 instruments, 43 loops & samples, and 2 songs
- Exclusive to Medly Member

Improvements:

Live Mode:
- In Live Mode, you can now tap on multiple Sections at the same time.
- Undo & Redo will automatically hide when entering Live Mode.
- The 2 finger gesture to show and hide Undo & Redo will be disabled in Live Mode.
- Show and hide Undo & Redo using the Settings panel (open by pressing the gear in the top right).

Bug fixes:
- Fixed an issue where tapping the "Settings" and "Add Album" icons were sometimes unresponsive.
- Fixed an issue that caused Audio Recording to crash.

Important Note

iOS Support:
- After this version, we're dropping support for iOS 12
- Moving forwards, we'll only be supporting iOS 13 and newer

Pack Updates:
- For the months of April and May, we will not ship new sounds
- We will continue our releases starting in June
- We're not taking a break, we're just working on something big
